string.value:
#p2103# wants to make some #bnutritious juice#k and asked you to get these ingredients: #b#t4000004##k and #b#t4000011##k... Wonder what kind of juice this is...

#i4000004##t4000004# #b#c4000004##k/1 
#i4000011##t4000011# #b#c4000011##k/5
You gathered all the ingredients for #p2103#. #p2103# seemed to need another favor...
Hi? You're an adventurer, aren't you? Hmm... May I ask you for a favor?
Ah! Thank you. It's not that hard. You only have to find healthy ingredients for juice. The ingredients are one #b1#t4000004##k and 5 #b#t4000011#s#k.It shouldn't be hard to find them.
You can get #t4000004#s from #o0210100#s and #t4000011#s from #o0120100#s. Slimes are green jumping monsters. They're fast and strong, so be careful!
Hmm... Since you just started your adventure, I guess you're quite busy. When you are free, come back to me.
Wow! You have all ingredients to make some nutritious juice. Fantastic! Now, it will only take a second to make the juice!
Would you please wait until I make the juice?

Hmm... I think you haven't gathered the ingredients yet. You need #bone#t4000004##k and #bfive#t4000011#s#k. If you want to know how many ingredients you have gathered, please check your inventory or quest window.
